bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 2연속 데미지
bb.name: 뇌신렬참

dictionary.description: A warrior from the ruined Atharva Republic, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Raised in an old mine, he worked from the time he was a child. At one point he grew tired and left to become a demon bounty hunter. His swordsmanship was tempered through his mine work, and he could obliterate a normal demon in one blow. He spoke rough, but was polite to women.
dictionary.fusion:
Wow!
Can you feel that
energy flowing!?
dictionary.summon:
Hey! Get out of my way!
Friend or foe, no one stands
in front of me!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 2연속 데미지
bb.name: 뇌속렬파참

dictionary.description: A warrior from the ruined Atharva Republic, he later became one of the Six Heroes. He trained hard until he developed the confidence to defeat large demons on his own. However, when he saw Princess Emilia fighting a demon, he realized how inexperienced he really was. After that, Eze sought out fights with other masters, hoping to unlock his own hidden powers.
dictionary.evolution:
Where are my real enemies?!
Why do I have to waste my
time with these little bugs?
dictionary.fusion:
Whoa!
No way! I'm even more
powerful than before!
dictionary.summon:
You heard my thunder!?
Some nerve you have, but still
I might as well help you!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 5연속 데미지
bb.name: 뇌신렬파참

dictionary.description: A warrior from the ruined Atharva Republic, he later became one of the Six Heroes. While training, he found the Thunder Sword Batootha among the treasure he received when he defeated Behemoth. It held the power of lighting, bringing Eze's skill to a whole new level. He could tear through armor like paper, and people call him the Thunder King. They still talk of his bravery.
dictionary.evolution:
Thunder Sword Batootha's lighting will burn this image
into your mind!
dictionary.fusion:
Whoa!
Feel the electricty flow from
Thunder Sword Batootha!
dictionary.summon:
Thunder Sword Batootha!
Turn all those foolish enough
to face me into ash!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 7연속 데미지
bb.name: 뇌신천섬

dictionary.description: A warrior from the ruined Atharva Republic. One of the six heroes and said to have fought the gods wielding Thunder Sword Batootha, during the great war with the gods he decimated his enemies with elusive speed and devistating thunder blows despite the ridiculous odds he was up against. The epic tale of him saving Goddess Emilia is still held as a timeless tale.
dictionary.evolution:
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Now let my thunder attacks
destroy everything!
dictionary.fusion:
Wow! I can't be stopped!
There's none who can face me!
dictionary.summon:
Lightning! Rain down on me!
Fill me with the numbing
power to aid this fool!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 8연속 데미지
bb.name: 뇌신천열격

dictionary.description: A warrior from the ruined Atharva Republic, he later became one of the Six Heroes. It was Eze who saved the republic's female general Emilia during the intense battle with the gods. At that time Emilia spoke to Eze, who then began to overflow with more explosive power than ever before. Eze later boasted of what Emilia had told him to a friend. Apparently, she had said "You're not just some idiot. You're an idiot to be respected."
dictionary.evolution:
Listen up!
The greatest idiot swordsman
on earth is me!!
dictionary.fusion:
Wooooow!
Gimme more!
I'm gonna destroy them all!!
dictionary.summon:
My Batootha is pleased!
It's happy to be in existence at
the same time as me!!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛 공격력 50% 상승&HP 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌굉신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 10연속 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 대폭 상승
sbb.name: 초뇌신천열섬

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 12연속 데미지
bb.name: 뇌제성쇄참

dictionary.description: As he made his way onto the heart of the battle against the gods, a woman appeared to threaten his life. Refusing to fight with a woman, Eze hesitated to strike her as her ferocious attacks kept coming at him. However, through their exchange Eze finally realized the extent of this woman's resolution, and attaining powers greater than those of the gods, he took her life. Shortly after, a lone knight appeared before Eze, speaking to him with a sad expression on his face. Eze smiled broadly in response, and turning his blade towards himself, took his own life. It is said that Eze exclaimed "Only I can defeat my own self!" as he perished.
dictionary.evolution:
Open your eyes wide and take a good look!
This is what it means
to become stronger than a god!!!
dictionary.fusion:
Yeeeeaaah!!
My soul is screaming for more!
It craves to pulverize the gods!
dictionary.summon:
I won't lose to anyone!
Only I can defeat my own self!
I'll keep being an idiot till the end!

extra skill.desc: 「뇌검 바투타」장착시 전투중 모든능력 20%상승＆크리티컬시 부여 데미지 상승
extra skill.name: 각오하는 대우행

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛 공격력 100% 상승&HP 30% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌절신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 15연속 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 대폭 상승
sbb.name: 신의 천뢰극혜섬

ubb.desc: 적 전체에게 아주 강력한 뇌속성 3연속 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체<comma> 스파크 시 데미지 초대폭 상승
ubb.name: 전부 파괴해주마!

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 상승
bb.name: 뇌공의 호령

dictionary.description: A tactician from the ruined Atharva Republic, he led the republic in strategic ability and magic, but never took charge when it came to being a commander. That was not due to cowardice, but due to recognizing he had a different, more important role to play. He left many books organizing his theories which are still used as a foundation for modern tacticians.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm, individual strength will
certainly be needed in this skirmish.
dictionary.summon:
Oh, you're a Summoner, right?
Do you seek my wisdom?
I will lend you my ingenuity.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 대폭 상승
bb.name: 뇌격모의 호령

dictionary.description: A tactician from the ruined Atharva Republic. He was criticized for never appearing at the front, but he paid no mind to such comments and continued his command. After the war with the gods began,  he would annihilate his enemies with his magic. This earned him admiration, but he was ashamed that he had been attacked, and recorded it as his greatest mistake.
dictionary.evolution: When the tactician must fight, the strategy has failed.
dictionary.fusion:
Pay attention, even the
mightiest of warriors tend to
reveal their flaws.
dictionary.summon:
Summoning is an interesting art.
I will correctly make use
of your knowledge and skill.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 대폭 상승
bb.name: 뇌제전의 대호령

dictionary.description: A tactician from the ruined Atharva Republic. His strong eye for strategy not only saw his imminent defeat, but also that there were still some gods willing to save humanity. Due to this foresight he focused on surviving instead of winning. Many soldiers called him weak, but the result was that many people were saved by him.
dictionary.evolution:
Battles end before they start.
Don't be a fool and rush into
battle without a plan!
dictionary.fusion:
Battles aren't won simply
by strengthening leaders. You
must also empower your troops.
dictionary.summon:
With my help, you'll
surely transcend boundries.
Would you like that?

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 섬광

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 대폭 상승
bb.name: 뇌군신의 대호령

dictionary.description: A tactician from the ruined Atharva Republic. Just as Lucius was reaching out to help, Weiss enacted his final end strategy. He used himself as a decoy so that others could escape. Despite there being no hope for reinforcements, with renewed morale his men followed his every word. Just as his people had escaped and he and his men were on the verge of defeat, legend has it that he said, "In the end, I guess we won."
dictionary.evolution:
You mustn't have fear.
Plans hatched out of fear are
easily read by the enemy.
dictionary.fusion:
There's no room in war for a
general who neglects resources.
Soldiers require support.
dictionary.summon:
Meeting me changes how people think.
Surely this power will benefit you
more than me, will it not?

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 섬광

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 공격력 대폭 상승
bb.name: 뇌장군신의 대호령

dictionary.description: A tactician who succeeded in helping many people to evacuate during the great war with the gods. He served as bait for his own final strategic ploy, facing off against the enemy as a lone sorcerer. He also used the intel he gained from his beloved birds as they spied from the skies, rendering him able to keep up with the God Army's movements. Determining his enemy's weak points from the heavens, the god army learned to fear him. His limitless lightning is said to have been able to split the gods in half.
dictionary.evolution:
We don't know when to expect supplies,
so holding our position would be foolish.
We must move out.
dictionary.fusion:
Let's conserve our energy.
It's important to get plenty of rest
before heading off to battle.
dictionary.summon:
Don't fear defeat.
Those who survive us
will surely do away with our regrets.

leader skill.desc: BB 사용시 BB게이지소비량 조금 경감＆스파크 시 배틀 크리스탈 출현률 대폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 패기

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 18연속 데미지＆확률로 1턴간 공격력&방어력 대폭 저하
sbb.name: 바르제 디고라

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 데미지
bb.name: 한 입 깨무는 일렉

dictionary.description: A liquid-type demon wrapped in electricity, thought to appear when lighting strikes. It has a horn on its head and a black pattern on its body. It is mischievous and laughs with its friends as it electrically shocks humans. They are still weak and very low level, but like so many other slimes they are perfect sparring partners for new Summoners.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm sparking!
Make me spark more!
dictionary.summon:
Zap!
Do you want to
spark with me?

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 2연속 데미지
bb.name: 통째로 베어 무는 일렉

dictionary.description: When Bolt Slime charges up, it evolves into Bolt Slime King. Its new electric shock power far exceeds that of Bolt Slime, and it can quickly put new Summoners in a bind. It has a very warlike nature, forcing Summoners into battle once it spots them. Thus, many Summoners immediately hide after spotting Bolt Slime King.
dictionary.evolution:
My spark has turned
into a rumble!
Wanna see?
dictionary.fusion:
Rumble, rumble, rumble!
My rumbling grows stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Rumble, boom!
You're fine with my
rumble, right?

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 10% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 수호

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 회복
bb.name: 번개 벚꽃 춤

dictionary.description: A beautiful dancer, extremely popular in the ruined Atharva Republic. Her dancing fascinates many people, sometimes violent, sometimes bewitching. There are many accounts of people gladly having their bodies, and their minds, healed by her dancing. Although it was later made public that her magic power was the result of her dance's demonic nature, her popularity never declined.
dictionary.fusion:
Are you enjoying yourself?
OK then, give me something
new to dance to!
dictionary.summon:
You wanna watch me dance?
Alright, then let me knock
your socks off with this one!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 10% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 수호

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복
bb.name: 법선치유연무

dictionary.description: A beautiful dancer, extremely popular in the ruined Atharva Republic. She healed many with her magical demon dance. After the war with the gods began, she stood up to the gods as her dance could call forth thunder as well as heal. Her figure charmed many, and when she returned from battle injured, doctors from all over the country came to treat her.
dictionary.evolution:
So you don't think a
dancer can put up a fight!?
Go ahead, try me!
dictionary.fusion:
I'm still not satisfied yet!
Lets keep on Dancing!
dictionary.summon:
Look! Watch me dance!
Let me show you exactly
how much you need me!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 10% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 수호

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복
bb.name: 천천치상의 춤

dictionary.description: A beautiful dancer, extremely popular in the ruined Atharva Republic. As the intense battle with the gods continued, she injected even more force into her magical demon dance. She unleashed thunder above her enemies as she cared for her allies. It is said that even just her presence inspired those who fought alongside her. Having noticed this, the gods concentrated their attack on her, but many soldiers around her gathered to act as her shield and defend her from their fierce attack.
dictionary.evolution:
I wonder, do you understand
the power of my demon dance?
Hehe, you can be honest!
dictionary.fusion:
I guess I've no choice but
to dance more aggressively.
I'll do it for you just once!
dictionary.summon:
You want to see me dance?
I'm OK with that.
I'll put you under my spell!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 10% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 수호

bb.desc: 4턴간 아군 전체의 방어력 상승
bb.name: 윈드 아머

dictionary.description: A half-human, half-bird female monster from the birdman tribe. With her lusty nature, she seduces young men on sight. Men who take her invitation, tempted by her lascivious looks, are taken to the harpy nest, and fed to harpy children. However, there is no safe choice. Someone who refuses is immediately charged and ripped to shreds by her sharp claws.
dictionary.fusion:
You're nice.
You think I am too, right?
dictionary.summon:
I've been charmed by you.
I will protect you from now on.

bb.desc: 4턴간 아군 전체의 방어력 상승
bb.name: 윈드 프로텍션

dictionary.description: A half-man, half-bird female monster from the birdman tribe. After a harpy gains a lot of experience in combat, the magic inside her is released, and she evolves into Aero. Naturally, her fighting power and lusty nature grow as she continues to seduce men to satisfy her appetite. Few desire being liked by Aero since she favors those who look delicious.
dictionary.evolution:
I like you so much
I could eat you right up...
Would you mind that?
dictionary.fusion:
You like me, right?
I like you, too.
dictionary.summon:
Your tasty flavor
is just what I like.
Come a little closer...

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 카르마 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 영혼의 빛

bb.desc: 4턴간 아군 전체의 방어력 상승
bb.name: 아머 스톰

dictionary.description: A half-human, half-bird female monster from the birdman tribe. Though friends of the voracious and lusty Harpys, these unique individuals seek not prey, but combat. They are said to be the evolved form of battle experienced Aeros that've gained power after numerous encounters. According to monster researchers, these Ocypete's inhabit the mountains where Harpy's nest, where they take care of intruders in protecting their species.
dictionary.evolution:
Huh, what do you want?
Will you take me into battle?
Oh ho ho, I'm so excited.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh ho ho, how nice of you.
How easy it will be to dice
things up now.
dictionary.summon:
You smell like the battlefield!
Oh ho ho, I really like it.
No use refusing, I'm not leaving!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 카르마 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 영혼의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 뇌속성 6연속 데미지
bb.name: 라이트닝 매그넘

dictionary.description: An air pirate using an other-worldly pistol, widely known throughout the ruined Atharva Republic. Grafl was from a family that safeguarded flying ships using unique spheres, but he broke a family taboo and fled on a stolen ship. Although those in power labeled him an air pirate for his theft and forbidden pistol wielding, he tried his best to lead an honest life.
dictionary.fusion:
Will you give me power?
If you do, I'll pay you back
with my pistol!
dictionary.summon:
Don't see many like you.
But don't worry, us strange
folk gotta stick together!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 강력한 뇌속성 9연속 데미지
bb.name: 채리엇 매그넘

dictionary.description: An air pirate using an other-worldly pistol, widely known in the ruined Atharva Republic. He traveled with his crew on his airship, and once fought against the republic soldier, Falma. Impressed, Grafl asked him to join, but Falma refused, wanting an equal partnership. Still, they became close friends, standing shoulder-to-shoulder through many battles.
dictionary.evolution:
Do you have the courage and
resolution to stand in front
of my pistol?
dictionary.fusion:
Reloading complete!
I'm ready to fight!
dictionary.summon:
Were you looking for me
or for my pistol?
Matters not, for we're a team!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 강력한 뇌속성 12연속 데미지
bb.name: 페르쿠나스 트리거

dictionary.description: An air pirate using an otherworldly pistol, widely known throughout the ruined Atharva Republic. Grafl made his way through the sky on his ship, fighting the gods as he went along. Aiding his good friend Sky King Falma in vanquishing the gods, his skills as a marksman quickly surpassed that of a mere support gunner, and he soon found himself taking down gods himself. In appreciation of Grafl's support despite this, Falma affectionately called him the Sky Emperor.
dictionary.evolution:
Evolving isn't so bad.
I wonder if I may finally be
able to stand beside you now?
dictionary.fusion:
This gun isn't just loaded
with bullets, you know?
I've put my soul into it!
dictionary.summon:
This gun belongs to me and
the lost souls of my dear friends.
You must've known this already.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 2연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 혼신의 일격

dictionary.description: An extremely powerful monster from the giant tribe. They're called minotaurs as their heads are bull-shaped. As expected, they are very warlike, and to say that a minotaur fights at the drop of a towel would be no exaggeration. However, they are not too smart and will blindly follow anyone stronger than themselves. Confident fighters often try to subjugate minotaurs.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm stronger!!
But I can still grow more!!
dictionary.summon:
You look strong.
I'll go with you.
You'll train me.

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 4연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 파괴의 일격

dictionary.description: An extremely powerful monster from the giant tribe. They are warlike, just like all giants. Above all, they like tough combat with strong opponents. They are more intelligent than they look, and have a unique philosophy that says "fighting for food is hunting, not combat." Thus, they won't plunder, and get food by capturing others and forcing them into slavery.
dictionary.evolution:
As I get stronger,
I become happier.
Are you happy?
dictionary.fusion:
My power is my
strength in combat!
Now lets fight!
dictionary.summon:
My power of destruction is
capable of destroying everything.
You think you can control me?

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 카르마 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 영혼의 빛

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 6연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 거괴도끼의 일격

dictionary.description: A monster boasting incredible power who is said to come from a species of giants. Even within the battle-hungry giant race, this particular species is completely obsessed with battle, fighting incessantly day and night from the moment they are born, until their very death. Although its body is made up of pure solid muscle, it has an intelligence that puts humans to shame. However, it holds no other interests besides battle. Only a few humans have sought aid from this gigantic and wise creature, but since it demands a fight from the person requesting help as compensation, most of those who do ask only end up beaten to death.
dictionary.evolution:
Now that I have this power,
I want to try it right away!
Get ready for a fight!
dictionary.fusion:
This is...yes!
Let's go Summoner!
Let's battle right away!
dictionary.summon:
A day of bloodbath!
If you ask for my help,
that is how you must repay me!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 카르마 출현률 상승
leader skill.name: 영혼의 빛

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 BC와 HC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 정령의 날개

dictionary.description: A powerful spirit said to freely control the wind. Their bodies are free-forming, allowing them to change shape at will, though they usually take the form of a winged woman. Human information interests them and they will sneak into homes to collect secrets. Many humans have suffered from their tricks, but it's generally accepted that they don't intend to hurt people.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, how nice!
You seem very promising!
dictionary.summon:
You must have good taste,
summoning me like you did.
Now let's have some fun!

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 BC와 HC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 탈정 정령진

dictionary.description: A powerful spirit said to freely control the wind. Magically stronger than sylphs, they are positive and friendly, albeit very fickle. Since they are so fickle, they are said to be lucky in a way. Rumor is that befriending a Djin is extremely lucky, though this is only a rumor. Recently it seems they enjoy hiding and blowing wind up travelers' backsides.
dictionary.evolution:
Huh!　Evolution?!
Just look at me now!
dictionary.fusion:
Here, here. Come closer.
You are too easy!
dictionary.summon:
Thank you for summoning me!
I was getting so bored.
Let me show you my wind!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 3턴간 아군 전체의 BC와 HC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 칼라의 바람

dictionary.description: A mutated spirit that can control the wind. Not originally from Grand Gaia, one is born when a Djin and a spirit that sometimes ventures in from another world fuse together. Unlike the carefree Djin, they are interested in strengthening themselves and hold great magical power. Seemingly as if memories still remain from the other world from which they came, they often speak and act very maturely for their age. Also, as they like lecturing others, there are few they dislike.
dictionary.evolution:
So this is the real me?
Not bad, I must say.
dictionary.fusion:
Forget strengthening me,
you should power up yourself!
dictionary.summon:
It was you who summoned me?
You're the first human I've met
in a while worth training with.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 뇌속성 5연속 데미지
bb.name: 선더 스톰

dictionary.description: A strange bird that lives in valleys enveloped by thunder clouds. The reason other creatures can't approach it is that it can control all thunder in the valley. It emits lighting when it finds prey, stunning it before it brings it back to its nest. Recent studies show that it brings its prey back still alive so that its chicks can practice hunting safely.
dictionary.fusion:
My thunder!!
It's even stronger!!
dictionary.summon:
Did you call for me, Summoner?
I will join you, so quickly,
show me where to strike!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 10% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 수호

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 뇌속성 5연속 데미지
bb.name: 빌자라이저

dictionary.description: A mutant Thunderbird. With an even larger body than the Thunderbird, it's wing span is so big that its spread wings are said to block out the sun. Its lightning attacks are far stronger than the Thunderbird's, and those directly struck are electroshocked instantly. Summoners who confront the intimidating Ziz most focus on survival before all else.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you feel it, Summoner?
The power of my lightning
is undeniable!
dictionary.fusion:
Lightning, shoot forth!
Lightning, spread!
dictionary.summon:
Do you want my lightning?
Take me to your enemies.
I will show them fear.

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 10% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 수호

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 뇌속성 5연속 데미지
bb.name: 엑스라디아

dictionary.description: The evolved form of a Ziz that absorbed the power from a dragon it consumed. It looks completely different from before, and its huge wings greatly increase its flying ability. In addition, it also has the tough scales and sharp claws of a dragon. Its thunder attack is even more powerful than Ziz's and its area of attack is much wider than before. It's said that once you're targeted by Zazabis, there's nowhere to run and hide.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner! Look!
My wings are so beautiful!
I'll show you my new power!
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner!
Check out my thunder strike!
It's more powerful than ever!
dictionary.summon:
I was summoned?
Let me test your strength
to see if it is real!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 15% 감소
leader skill.name: 번개의 결계

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 11연속 데미지＆확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 레빈 폴

dictionary.description: The original divine bird which all other types of birds are descended from. Since the time when the heavens and the earth were created, this astral being has watched over the land from the skies. No human has ever laid eyes upon this creature, and only one line in all of mythology actually references it. "Storms are born when Ardas flaps its wings, and its cries manifest into thunder clouds." Whoever manages to summon this legendary bird will gain the power to change the entire world.
dictionary.evolution:
Remember this, Summoner!
I reside in the heart of storms!
I surge like lightning!
dictionary.fusion:
Were you expecting me?
Rejoice, Summoner!
For I have risen from the flames!
dictionary.summon:
Be amazed! Fear me, Summoner!
I have arrived!
To be by your side!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 15% 감소＆스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 결계

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 27연속 데미지＆3턴간 스파크 시 데미지 상승
sbb.name: 풀그레이터

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 5연속 데미지&확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 플래쉬 스트림

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined Atharva Republic. His mid-air, dual wielding fighting style earned him the name Sky Knight. Extremely loyal, Falma will follow his lord's commands without question, and works hard to carry them out. He's close friends with Sky Boss Grafl, and it's said their friendship came from them noticing how different they really were.
dictionary.fusion:
A knight must become stronger!
I aim to take my dual blade skill to an even higher level!
dictionary.summon:
These dual blades are
my pride as a knight!
Can you handle this power?

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 맹자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 7연속 데미지&확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 듀얼 아크

dictionary.description: A mighty dual-wielding knight that belonged to the ruined Atharva Republic's cavalry. During the battle with the gods, he battled along side his friend, Sky Boss Grafl, on his airship. He had always been good at mid-air fighting, so his soldiers called him the Sky King. Legend has it that he defeated god after god by fearlessly leaping onto their backs and attacking.
dictionary.evolution:
Look! See my dual blades shine!
That is the light of friendship, tempered with my friends!
dictionary.fusion:
My dual blades harness
the strength of friendship!
That's how I got so strong!
dictionary.summon:
My right hand is justice,
my left is friendship.
But who do my blades shine for?

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 15% 상승
leader skill.name: 왕자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 8연속 데미지＆확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 라이징 아크

dictionary.description: A mighty dual-wielding knight of the Atharva Republic, he journeyed the skies in his good friend Grafl's ship, vanquishing countless gods along the way. In an attempt to defeat him, the leader of the gods began attacking his ship while he was away. Watching his good friend and his ship fall under heavy attack from the gods, Falma's anger reached its peak. Earth shattering lightning surged from his blades as he screamed, "My friends are here with me, in my blades!"
dictionary.evolution:
This isn't over yet!
I have a promise to keep!
That is why I must evolve!
dictionary.fusion:
Lightning, gather in my blades!
Give me the power to
vanquish the gods!
dictionary.summon:
The glistening of my blades
is a sign of everlasting friendship!
Are you worthy of leading me?

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 20% 상승
leader skill.name: 패왕의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 15연속 데미지＆확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 프로비던스 아크

dictionary.description: A mighty dual-wielding knight of the Atharva Republic. After landing a single blow that slayed a powerful god who had attacked his friend's ship, he started falling towards the ground alongside the god's corpse. It is said that he had a satisfied smile on his face as he dropped from the heavens. However, a voice reached out to him as he fell, subsequently opening his eyes and extending his arms. The voice was still resonating in his ears when he saw his friend grabbing firmly onto his arm.
dictionary.evolution:
Thank you.
My wings are proof of friendship.
I can fly because I have friends!
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks.
My power is not just for me to use!
Let's grow stronger together!
dictionary.summon:
Let's work together!
We can join hands,
and soar the skies!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛 공격력 25%상승＆수속성 유닛으로부터 피해 데미지 15% 감소
leader skill.name: 수신의 위광

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 19연속 데미지＆확률로 마비 효과＆3턴간 아군 전체의 공격<comma> 방어<comma> 회복력 크게 상승
sbb.name: 이터니티 템페스트

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 2연속 데미지
bb.name: 크래쉬 바인드

dictionary.description: A beast characterized by its muscular body and two giant horns. In addition to being a powerful beast, Behemoth is also a violent thunder-wielder. Its massive horns can smash bone in one blow and its thunder can instantly paralyze an enemy. Using its entire body, its fierce charge can annihilate an entire battalion.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more power!!
Otherwise, I will eat you!!
dictionary.summon:
You require the strength
of the beasts? How ridiculous!
Only I can grant you that!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 3연속 데미지
bb.name: 메테오 제퍼

dictionary.description:
A beast characterized by its muscular body and giant horns.
Behemoths can't coexist with other behemoths. They will fight to the death if they meet. Those that survive this struggle become a King Behemoth. Their roar symbolize death, and those who hear it can do little more than sit and pray that the storm doesn't come their way.
dictionary.evolution:
Lead me to my prey!
I will make quick work of it!
dictionary.fusion:
Roar!!
Let my power grow!!
dictionary.summon:
Growl! My roar signals
the end of a life.
Endure it and become my master!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 반짝임

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 4연속 데미지
bb.name: 로드마기어 그랫지

dictionary.description: A beast known for its muscular body and giant horns. This evolved form is said to harness a power far greater than any Behemoth to be seen in Grand Gaia.  Whatever stands in its way is leveled instantly. Legends tell of mountains being pulverized and turned to sand by this mythical beast.
dictionary.evolution:
Think you can handle
my strength? Tell me who
to destroy!
dictionary.fusion: No one can stop me now!!
dictionary.summon:
My grief, a massive waterfall,
my rage, a roaring thunder!
I shall join you!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 섬광

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 6연속 데미지
bb.name: 선더 조그

dictionary.description: Behemoth was born in an environment full of otherworldly power. Its internal drive to strengthen itself is the trait that separates this powerful magical beast apart from the others. Not only would it strengthen itself physically, but the otherworldly power held inside of it would evolve as well. Though in the process of evolving most of its body is destroyed, in its complete evolved form it is said to have the power to sink continents.
dictionary.evolution:
Hear me roar!
Fear my approaching footsteps!
Now is the time of destruction!
dictionary.fusion:
Allow me to introduce you
to the destroyer of all!
dictionary.summon:
Back away from me!
Or maybe I should turn
you to dust!!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 신광

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 7연속 데미지＆3턴간 스파크 시 데미지 상승
sbb.name: 라비엘 제트

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 5연속 데미지&확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 크로스레어 블릿츠

dictionary.description: A dual-wielding general mentioned in the records of the ruined Atharva Republic. She distinguished herself in battle by using a technique she developed herself. Minstrels of her day sang of her climb to the rank of general. Popular with the people, songs said she was "as furious as thunder, fighting as though she were dancing." This earned her the title, "Thunder Dancer."
dictionary.fusion:
No one can defend against
my shining dual blades!
dictionary.summon:
My name is Emilia, but I'm
also known as the Thunder Dancer!
Bow before me, Summoner!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 5연속 데미지&확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 엘제넷 세이버

dictionary.description: A dual-wielding general mentioned in the records of the ruined Atharva Republic. She focused on training soldiers after becoming a general, but she was so severe that many were honorably discharged from service. Her battlefield initiative earned her the respectful title of Princess Emilia. It is said she tried her hardest to smile whenever her title changed.
dictionary.evolution:
I won't stop now!
Come with me and let's
aim for the top!
dictionary.fusion:
My strength isn't for you!
It's for protecting the
frail masses!
dictionary.summon:
Stupid child! Be grateful
you're able walk with me!
Devote your life to me!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 7연속 데미지&확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 제노사이드 레번

dictionary.description: A dual-wielding general mentioned in the records of the ruined Atharva Republic. She fought on the front lines, even during the war with the gods. In Atharva, she reached the same level as the Commander Weiss. Rumor was that they were lovers, but she vehemently denied this when asked. She lived her short life single, saying, "I live for my sword, not love."
dictionary.evolution:
I will transcend and
evolve if it is asked of me.
Everyone should do the same.
dictionary.fusion:
How my power overflows!
My soul trembles with joy!!
dictionary.summon:
Only a great warrior could
have the power to subdue me!
What do you plan to do with me?

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 11연속 데미지＆확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 리너딕 엠퍼러

dictionary.description: A female general reportedly from the Atharva Republic. She was saved by Eze after finding herself in trouble fighting the gods. Afterwards, she became obsessed with power, and, inheriting equipment from a former ally procured from the otherworld, poured all she had into strengthening herself. In the end there would be rumors of her relationships with Weiss, Eze, former allies and so forth, despite her being recorded as saying, "It's pathetic only being able to see human relationships from an emotional standpoint."
dictionary.evolution:
I desire the greatest of power!
Summoner, what do you need
from my evolved form?
dictionary.fusion:
This is a Summoner's power?
I accept your offering!
I will use it to grow stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Are you searching for
power just as I am?
I will follow your will then!

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승&턴 경과로 BB게이지 증가
leader skill.name: 뇌패신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 13연속 데미지＆확률로 마비와 약화 효과
sbb.name: 페르쿠나스 세이버

dictionary.description: A small nymph thought to be born from thunder, one of the six elements made by the gods. It carelessly follows things it finds interesting. However, as its thunder body is shocking to the touch, one must be careful near it if only to avoid being zapped. Many Summoners try to capture these as they're said to be able to give special powers to others.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Thunder Nymph, boom!
You are really interesting.
I'll follow you, zap!

dictionary.description: A spirit that rules thunder, one of the six elements made by the gods. It's always discharging electricity, making it difficult to get close to one. Summoners look for them believing that they can awaken inherent abilities, but struggle to counteract the electricity which constant flows from them. It is not as though they are hostile though, they simply cannot control their own conductivity.
dictionary.summon:
Do you like spirits?
People are OK too, I guess.
Be nice to me or be zapped!

dictionary.description: Worshipers of thunder gave this miraculous idol life through prayer. It's often spoken of in popular adventure tales. Adventurers in the search of treasure at ancient ruins are often thwarted by electricity it shoots from its stone mouth. Today it continues to hinder the desires of summoners seeking the ability to awaken mysterious inherent powers.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Thunder Idol.
Seems you understand me.
Well then, I'll follow you.

dictionary.description: Created by the gods, it embodies thunder's power.  Its heaven-reaching body appears in a flash of thunder when a god slams down his gavel in judgement of the world. The Elgaian people believed it only to be a legend until it was seen by humans for the first time after Lucius' gate opened. Legend has is that those who the great gods deem worthy can gain their power.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Thunder Totem.
You would be wise to use
my powers justly.

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 3연속 데미지＆낮은 확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 뇌속연각

dictionary.description: A fighter hailing from the Republic of Atalva who trained at the Toltya Dojo in the Sama Kingdom, he first knocked on its gates at the age of 12. A timid child lacking the approval of his peers, he was actually sent to the dojo by his father as a means of toughening him up. Though constantly on the verge of tears on account of his grueling training regimen, he found comfort in his friendship with Nemia, and soon developed romantic feelings for her.
dictionary.fusion: Yes! The power’s swelling within me! No one can touch me now!
dictionary.summon: Hah! Leave everything to me! W-Wait... You can’t expect me to go up against that guy!?

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 맹자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 4연속 데미지＆낮은 확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 비연뇌속연각

dictionary.description:
A fighter hailing from the Republic of Atalva who trained at the Toltya Dojo in the Sama Kingdom.
After Nemia left the dojo to look for her parents, Zeln began to focus on his training so that he might one day be able to follow after her. His legs, already strong from all the running away he’d done as a child, seemed like the natural place to start. Before long, he had developed his signature Lightning Kick, a flurry of kicks so fast it defied belief.
dictionary.evolution: My new and evolved kick technique is faster than lightning. Think you can keep up?
dictionary.fusion: It’s still not enough! My kick needs to be stronger if I’m to impress her!
dictionary.summon: It’s finally my turn to shine! Just wait’ll you see this kick I’ve been working on!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 맹자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 5연속 데미지＆낮은 확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 비연뇌신연각

dictionary.description: A fighter hailing from the Republic of Atalva who trained at the Toltya Dojo in the Sama Kingdom. After completing his training, Zeln set out on a journey to look for Nemia while continuing to hone his skills. He followed tales of Nemia’s exploits across the land, leaving a trail of humbled challengers in his wake. It’s said that he rescued Nemia from the jaws of death while fighting the gods in Sama, but whether this is true or not is a matter for debate.
dictionary.evolution: Say hello to my evolved form! This is the true face of the Lightning King.
dictionary.fusion: Come to me, power! Forge my body into a blade capable of saving the one I love!
dictionary.summon:
Summoner!
Can you cure people of their regrets?
If so, my power is yours to command.

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 15% 상승
leader skill.name: 왕자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 6연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 뇌속신축

dictionary.description: A fighter who trained at the Toltya Dojo. He continued his training in various places, but after hearing of Nemia's countless victories decided to seclude himself in the mountains. Zeln, whose sole desire was strength, saw his abilities grow beyond even his own limits. Having completed his training, Zeln returned to his dojo to find Nemia under attack from the gods. With a smile on his face he dashingly tried to save her, though what he got in return was her fist.
dictionary.evolution:
Thunder isn't just fast, you know.
Allow me to show you how
I got my name!
dictionary.fusion:
Surely I'm not the only
one who's grown stronger.
More! I need more power!
dictionary.summon:
I'm not just fast,
these phantasmagoric moves
or the essence of my being!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 20% 상승
leader skill.name: 패왕의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 12연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 뇌신신렬축

dictionary.description: A fighter who trained at the Toltya Dojo. After suffering a furious punch from Nelmia, Zeln finally realized how he felt about her as he tried to keep his balance. From that moment, he traveled to various regions in order to save people, growing as a reliable presence on the battlefield. Once he obtained information stating that the God Army planned to destroy the Vriksha Duchy, Zeln rushed towards Nemia's side to tell her once and for all about his feelings for her. He is said to have been clad in bolts of lightning.
dictionary.evolution:
I won't only protect her,
but I'll protect everyone else too.
That's the path I've chosen!
dictionary.fusion:
I need more power to help others.
No matter who gets in my way,
I'll always keep moving forward!
dictionary.summon:
I put my heart into everything I do.
I didn't get it before,
but now I want to do whatever I can.

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 30% 상승&배틀크리스탈 출현율 대폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁신의 전화

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 16연속 데미지＆아군에게 2턴간 방어력 무시 공격 부여＆3턴간 자신의 방어력을 반감하고 공격력 대폭 상승
sbb.name: 공천 「무환뇌포」

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 2연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 너 때릴거야!

dictionary.description: A young girl with a passion for controlling lightning. After miraculously surviving a lightning strike as a child, she grew up to harbor an overwhelming fascination with all things storm-related. Desperate to harness the power of lightning herself, she developed a hammer capable of transforming its wielder’s swing into a burst of electrical energy. Eager to put her invention to the test, she set out, hammer in hand, to hunt monsters in dangerous lands.
dictionary.fusion:
The voltage isn’t high enough!
I need to find a way to charge
this even more...
dictionary.summon:
You’re a Summoner, right?
There's something intriguing about you,
but I'm pretty interesting too, ya know!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 3연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 완전 쎄게 때릴거야!

dictionary.description: A young girl with a passion for controlling lightning. After succeeding in her attempt to harness electricity, Elulu began to research other ways to increase her strength. Fed up with lugging her heavy hammer around, she used anti-gravity techniques to modify her weapon until it was light enough for even a young girl to wield. Unfortunately for mankind, she only ever used her expertise in anti-gravity technology for her own purposes.
dictionary.evolution:
Upgrade complete!
Don’t get comfy, though...
I haven’t even got started yet!
dictionary.fusion:
High voltage, here I come!
Watch out you don’t get
zapped to bits!
dictionary.summon:
You wanna try my hammer?
OK, I'll let you have a go then.
You’re wearing rubber soles, right?

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 반짝임

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 4연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 내 발명품을 보여줄게!

dictionary.description: A young girl with the ability to control lightning. After toiling tirelessly to optimize her hammer, Elulu eventually succeeded in developing a model capable of discharging the same amount of energy as an actual bolt of lightning. When combined with an explosive burst of anti-gravity, Elulu’s hammer released a force potent enough to cause seismic shifts. Those who saw her unleash a mighty blow with her hammer likened her to a goddess from a creation myth.
dictionary.evolution:
Upgrade complete!
Prepare to witness the ultimate
power of lightning!
dictionary.fusion:
Maximum voltage...
Output primed...
Full boost ahead!
dictionary.summon:
Flash of lightning!
The roaring swing of the hammer!
I'll render all numb with my power!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 섬광

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 6연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 엄청 큰 번개 간다!

dictionary.description: A young girl with the ability to control lightning. It's said that as she carried out experiments with the mechanical hammer she had created, small explosions could be heard coming from her studio. It has also been recorded that when the gods appeared she released an even greater explosion that leveled many of the gods' soldiers. There are rumors that this explosion was strategic, as afterwards Elulu appeared from it when a new hammer with which she laid waste to the army of the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
Now it's my hammer's turn!
I'll paralyze all your enemies
with fear!
dictionary.fusion:
Charge complete!
I'll show you how hard
my new hammer hits!
dictionary.summon:
There's nothing impossible
in a world with thunder.
Let's go!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승＆공격 시 확률로 BB게이지 증가
leader skill.name: 중격의 호령

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 8연속 데미지＆확률로 부상＆3턴간 BB게이지 서서히 증가
sbb.name: 창조가 나의 전부야!

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 5연속 데미지
bb.name: 라이트닝 레이어

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. The son of a sword instructor to the Palmyna Royal Family, Loch despaired at his lack of natural talent for the sword, and ran away from home. Ironically, his efforts to survive in the wild forced him to develop a talent for archery instead. After hearing that his childhood crush, Princess Edea, had embarked on a mission to defeat the gods, he decided to return home to Palmyna.
dictionary.fusion:
You can make me stronger, you say?
I’m in need of all the power
I can get...
dictionary.summon:
You need my strength, right?
That’s fine by me, I guess.
I’ve got no reason to turn you down.

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 6연속 데미지
bb.name: 팔서 폴

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. While continuing his search for Princess Edea, Loch honed his skills with the bow so that he might one day join her in her fight against the gods. Upon finally reuniting with Edea, however, he was dismayed to hear the ice mage Dean cracking jokes with her. Loch’s arrows were meant for the gods, but in a jealous fit of rage, they very nearly found a new target.
dictionary.evolution:
This is evolution, you say?
Hmm, not too shabby...
You've many talents, I see.
dictionary.fusion:
I must train hard every day.
There’s no telling when she
might need me.
dictionary.summon:
I've dedicated all my training to
the one most important to me...
Who, you ask? Never you mind.

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 7연속 데미지
bb.name: 라이징 노바

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. In the final showdown with the gods attacking Palmyna, Loch played a vital role, and it was he who struck the final blow against the commander of the gods. Unfortunately, Edea was gravely wounded trying to protect Loch in battle. Legend has it that, in a fit of rage, Loch unleashed an attack that shook the world’s very foundations.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you feel it?
The soul residing within my arrow.
This is the true Loch!
dictionary.fusion:
Hahaha!
My anger is increases with my strength.
The gods will pay for what they did!
dictionary.summon:
My arrows are god killers.
What will you do with such
power at your disposal?

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 창세뇌신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 9연속 데미지
bb.name: 인베이드 크라운

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. After landing a piercing blow on the god Cardes, Loch changed his focus to a girl who was special to him. However, in her place was a massive plant with its vines stretched out. Overcome with fear, he was grabbed in by these vines, and at the same time he lost conciousness. It is said that during this he saw the girl's smile. Awaking in Encervis, it was obvious his first objective would be to get to where the gods were sealed away.
dictionary.evolution:
One arrow wasn't enough.
That's why I need more.
I need the arrows to save them.
dictionary.fusion:
Please give me power,
not just to defeat the gods,
but also to save those I love.
dictionary.summon:
There may be no saving us.
Still, I wish to be rescued.
What can you do to help me?

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승&방어력 회복력 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌천신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 아주 강력한 뇌속성 데미지
sbb.name: 신을 꿰뚫는 일격

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 28연속 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체의 스파크 시 데미지 상승
bb.name: 브레스톨 쿠랑

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. After Edea sacrificed herself in order to save her friends, Loch refused to believe she was dead, striving instead to locate the rest of his comrades who had been scattered during the fight against Cardes. After finding Edea in the underworld, he began to give a eulogy in her honor when Cardes suddenly attacked. It was during this fight that Loch realized his bow had become stronger every time the bonds of friendship he shared with his comrades deepened. And once the person he loved most of all opened her eyes again, the force of his arrows is said to have surpassed that of the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
The bond I share with my friends
makes me stronger. Same for you,
right? We've got lots in common.
dictionary.fusion:
Strength gained alone has a limit.
That's why I relied on my friends.
There's no shame in it.
dictionary.summon:
I had precious comrades.
You seem to have some too. You will
learn their true value someday.

extra skill.desc: 스파크 시 데미지 크게 상승&「신을 꿰뚫는 뇌궁 『에슈온』」을 장비하면 전투 중에 모든 능력 20% 상승
extra skill.name: 희망의 화살

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성 유닛의 공격력 100% 상승&방어력 30% 상승&스파크 시 데미지 크게 상승
leader skill.name: 찬란한 뇌궁신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 아주 강력한 뇌속성 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체에게 공격BB의 공격력 상승 효과 부여＆아군 전체의 스파크 시 데미지 상승
sbb.name: 하늘을 꿰뚫는 일섬

ubb.desc: 적 전체에게 아주 강력한 뇌속성 데미지＆2턴간 아군 전체에게 방어력 무시 공격 부여＆1턴간 자신의 스파크 시 데미지 초대폭 상승
ubb.name: 환성궁

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 4연속 데미지&확률로 약화효과
bb.name: 썬더 볼트

dictionary.description: A demon girl wielding brass claws, she used to be of the same species as Lilin, but her love for precious metals and stones was too much and she ended up consuming so much she became a completely new species. She's an easier demon to control given her obedience when awarded jewelry, but since she refuses to give up any of said jewelry that comes into her possession she can become quite a formidable demon should someone have their eyes on her treasure. She also seems to have little if any interest in the opposite sex.
dictionary.fusion:
If that's how it is then
I'll gladly fight alongside you!
Buy me something nice, OK?
dictionary.summon:
I want gems!
I don't need a lot.
Gimme one?

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 6연속 데미지＆확률로 약화 효과
bb.name: 고르곤 스파크

dictionary.description: The evolved form of Empusa with stronger demon abilities. It's said that those she looks upon are rendered motionless. Her lust for precious metals is stronger than ever, though they are not necessary in improving her abilities. Outside of wearing precious metals, she also seems to enjoy collecting them. She also has no problem declaring the golden snakes coming from her head as her most attractive feature.
dictionary.evolution:
Hmm, this is new!
Hehe, I look forward to
our adventures together!
dictionary.fusion:
I don't mind fusion,
but if you're going to do it
then how about a Jewel God?
dictionary.summon:
Aren't my snakes pretty?
Come on, take a look!
They're sparkling beautifully!!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 카르마 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 영혼의 빛

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 7연속 데미지＆HC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 인펄스 스피드

dictionary.description: A girl with cat-like ears and a tail discovered near the border of the La Veda Republic. Thought to be a new species of monster, she was quickly captured and sold to a circus. As tough as her days as a sideshow exhibit were, she came to know an acrobat from whom she was given the name Parmi. She then trained herself in acrobatics using her new abilities to bring great prosperity to the circus, and it's said that before long she was known and loved by everyone.
dictionary.fusion:
Parmi got stronger!
Give me praise, Summoner!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Parmi.
Are you kind, Summoner?
You won't hurt me, will you?

leader skill.desc: 성별을 알 수 없는 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 온전한 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 9연속 데미지＆HC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 스파이럴 스크래치

dictionary.description: A girl with cat-like ears and a tail discovered near the border of the La Veda Republic. As the bond between herself and the acrobat who gave her her name deepened, she grew tired of her life as an exhibit. With lightning fast agility there was no one who can stop her and she was easily able to escape. Having gained her independence, she lived a determined life in the shadows of the big city, though it seems she was still able to meet the acrobat from time to time.
dictionary.evolution:
I like you, Summoner.
Have I gotten stronger?
Do you like me too now?
dictionary.fusion:
Parmi is getting stronger!
I wanna grow even more
powerful for you, Summoner!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Parmi.
You smell nice, Summoner.
I, Parmi, will go with you.

leader skill.desc: 성별을 알 수 없는 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 온전한 힘

dictionary.description: A curious creature that lives in a pot which is said to hold a power capable of dramatically changing the properties of thunder. Though these creatures tend to be relatively calm and collected, since they become quite talkative after being summoned there are many Summoners who hesitate to take them on. However, in hopes of obtaining their amazing thunder effects, there are also many Summoners who just wear earplugs and summon them anyway.
dictionary.summon:
Hey Summoner, you only
want to use me in fusion, yeah?
We have much to talk about...

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal Ghost is said to have changed after having amassed extensive records on the element of thunder. Though they're thought to be ferocious due to them being of the thunder element, they are calm and speak with composure which causes some Summoners to walk away in pure bewilderment. The element of thunder is much stronger in them than in normal Metal Ghosts, and it's said that when fused to other thunder types they provide loads more experience as well.
dictionary.summon:
You want to use me in fusion?
You should really think of a more
efficient way to grow your army.

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal King is said to hold within its large body a huge collection of information on the element of thunder. They heavily dislike being in crowded places as they are quite fearful. It is said that when they gather with others from the metal record species they always speak ill of humans, saying things like "Those scary Summoners want to kidnap us all." However, they are also easily fooled and are quick to let their guard down when given a compliment.
dictionary.evolution:
Whoa! What?!
Really?! Hey!
Look how strong I am!
dictionary.summon:
D-Don't come near me!
Huh? You admire my dignity?
You've quite the discerning eye!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. For some reason they enjoy exhibiting the knowledge they hold inside, though since they speak regardless of whether or not someone wants to listen they are generally considered a nuisance. When they do occasionally notice someone subtly taking interest in them they quickly become silent, however they are just as quick to resume the conversation.
dictionary.summon:
Why the metal record species
exists is still a great mystery...
Ah, but I know much about it!

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 3연속 데미지&확률로 부상&약화효과
bb.name: 창기 뇌아삼연각

dictionary.description: The eldest daughter of an aristocratic family from Palmyna, she had a very strong sense of justice, and whenever anything happened within the domain she would race to the scene with her beloved halberd to solve the issue herself. Her parents thought this dangerous and tried to stop her, but her fair judgment received strong public support which forced them to approve. She mercilessly cut down criminals with what they revered to as her "Bolt Pike of Judgment."
dictionary.fusion:
I will become stronger!
Leave everything to me!
dictionary.summon:
Did you summon me?
If so, then let us bring justice
to where it is needed!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 맹자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 5연속 데미지&확률로 부상&약화효과
bb.name: 창기 뇌신삼연충

dictionary.description: The eldest daughter of an aristocratic family from Palmyna, she was invited to the imperial capital once the king got word of her bringing justice throughout the land with her beloved halberd. As Amy grew more and more excited, her father encouraged her to remain humble, however she ignored these words, testing her skills in the capital by dueling knight after knight. She gained popularity even in the imperial capital after her repeated victories, and came to be commonly known as the "Bolt Knight."
dictionary.evolution:
To judge someone you must
be stronger than they are.
That is why I must train!
dictionary.fusion:
My halberd sparkles!
Won't you bask in this
joy with me?
dictionary.summon:
My halberd shines with justice!
This power I give you is the
power of justice!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 15% 상승
leader skill.name: 왕자의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 7연속 데미지＆확률로 부상과 약화 효과
bb.name: 창술 뇌신삼연섬

dictionary.description: The eldest daughter of an aristocratic family from Palmyna, when the war with the gods began she begged the king to let her return to save her father, but he refused and made her focus on protecting him. During this time her home territory was destroyed by the gods, and her parents went missing. It's told that from then on she wielded her bolt pike for her homeland, but did so with a heavy heart, full of sadness from having gotten caught up in the joy of living in the capital and forgetting who she was really meant to protect.
dictionary.evolution:
Hesitation is weakness.
I will erase any hesitation I
sense with a thrust of my pike!
dictionary.fusion:
Underestimating your enemy
is no different than begging
for tragedy to befall you.
dictionary.summon:
I'll fight with you to defend
the helpless and use my bolt
pike to judge the gods!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력 20% 상승
leader skill.name: 패왕의 힘

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 강력한 뇌속성 10연속 데미지＆확률로 부상과 약화 효과
bb.name: 창술 뇌신공천

dictionary.description: The eldest daughter of an aristocratic family from Palmyna. Unable to persuade the king, she was forced to watch her home get destroyed by the gods from afar, where the anger and sadness of her situation destroyed her emotionally. Risking her life as she traversed the battlefield, there was no end to her fighting spirit, which, spreading to the warriors of both countries, sparked a flood of rage toward the gods. However, she would later come to realize that this is exactly what triggered Palmyna's destruction.
dictionary.evolution:
Please use my power.
I don't want to feel the regret I
felt that time again.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you very much.
I promise I won't let the power you
have given me go to waste!
dictionary.summon:
This blade protects those I love.
However, I misued it once.
Can you forgive me?

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛의 공격력과 방어력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 통신의 파동

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 13연속 데미지＆확률로 부상과 약화 효과
sbb.name: 자전신창

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 7연속 데미지＆확률로 부상＆약화효과
bb.name: 뇌신 콤보

dictionary.description: The powerful chief of a bandit clan in the Atharva Republic. It is said that whenever a crying child went silent, fear hung in the air, and when the sun went down, no one dared to step outside. He found joy in scaring others in this manner, and it is said that he placed more emphasis in inspiring fear in the heart of this victims than in the profit he made from stealing. A big scale armed force had to be mobilized in order to capture Raiden, but it failed to complete its mission. It wasn't until Falma and Grafl moved independently that Raiden was finally captured.
dictionary.fusion:
Wait, hold it right there.
If you make me any stronger...
I won't be able to guarantee your safety.
dictionary.summon:
Gahaha!
Even children dare not cry in front of me!
Raiden, of the slicing thunder, that's me!

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛이 5속성 이상일 때 HP와 회복력 15% 상승
leader skill.name: 오광의 유혼

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 9연속 데미지＆확률로 부상＆약화효과
bb.name: 살뇌콤보

dictionary.description: The powerful chief of a bandit clan in the Atharva Republic. Captured by Falma and Grafl, he was initially sentenced to life in prison until the war against the gods broke out. He was given the chance to fight in the civilian army in order to earn back his freedom. Apparently, having enjoyed fighting the gods so much, there are no accounts which state that he committed any crimes during this time. However, having chosen Eze as his rival, it is said that he unsuccessfully tried to take the Thunder Sword Batootha from him on numerous occasions.
dictionary.evolution:
What do you think?
Cool mask, right?
I wanna see you guys cower right now!
dictionary.fusion:
You're doing that again
to make me work hard for you?
Not interested!
dictionary.summon:
Gahahaha!
Supreme leader of the slicing thunder, Raiden has arrived!
Hey, act a bit more scared!

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛이 5속성 이상일 때 HP와 회복력 30% 상승
leader skill.name: 오광신의 유혼

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 5연속 데미지
bb.name: 라이징 인페르노

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Paris, a Summoner who served as one of the "Imperial Guards," bodyguards to the imperial family of the Randall Empire. Part of an elite force rumored to be even more powerful than the Demon Slayers, her abilities were incredibly powerful. As to why a mock Unit was created based on someone not from the Summoners' Hall, theories are coming in from both sides saying everything from "It was a high-reaching political move" to "It was due to an undeniable request from the head of the Development Department."
dictionary.fusion:
You're quite attentive for a
Summoner from the Hall.
I definitely admire that.
dictionary.summon:
So you're the Summoner
I've heard so much about.
Show me what you're made of.

leader skill.desc: 데미지를 입으면 BB게이지 증가&아주 낮은 확률로 받는 데미지를 1로 만든다
leader skill.name: 성공주의 수호

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 6연속 데미지
bb.name: 솔바이즈 데져

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Paris, a Summoner from the Randall Empire. A promising member of the Imperial Elite Forces, she was remarked for her rapidly improving skills. Despite being born to a prominent family she refused to get involved in all the politics and instead approached the Imperial Guards on her own. She had great respect for her commanding officer, Eriole, even though he was from lower class beginnings, and under his command she executed various tasks.
dictionary.evolution:
Ahh!
My power is overflowing...
Have I always had this inside?
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe, hasty I see.
You'd like to see my true
power, wouldn't you?
dictionary.summon:
Death to all the empire's foes!
Do your best to see I don't have
to say anything like that, OK?

leader skill.desc: 데미지를 입으면 BB게이지 증가&낮은 확률로 받는 데미지를 1로 만든다
leader skill.name: 성공주신의 수호

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 15연속 데미지＆아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복
bb.name: 램블링 롬

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Paris, a Summoner from the Randall Empire. After a certain incident took place Paris had become very depressed, but a request from the Akras Summoners' Hall pinned her against a demon on the battlefield, and she underwent a personal change quickly afterwards. Though she tended to rely more on others' power rather than on her own, her self-confidence grew, finally allowing her to break free from the shackles she had created for her own herself. With Paris's latent potential now fully awakened, this mock Unit seems to continue doing what Noel bids.
dictionary.evolution:
I choose my own path.
Settling on that makes me feel
like I've grown somewhat...
dictionary.fusion:
You want to see the real me?
I'll show you, if you like.
I'll make an exception just for you.
dictionary.summon:
I shall falter no longer.
I will follow my own path,
no matter where it leads me!

leader skill.desc: 데미지를 입으면 BB게이지 대폭 증가&확률로 받는 데미지를 1로 만든다
leader skill.name: 성스러운 통신의 수호

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 22연속 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체의 방어&회복력 상승＆3턴간 HC 출현율 상승
sbb.name: 리게일리어 펄규어라이트

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌광속성 7연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 제3신식 「이카즈치」

dictionary.description: The third youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters who fought against the gods in order to save the humans. Of all the sisters and their unique personalities she took on a coordinating role having one of the more moderate personalities of the lot. She was aware of the sins of the humans when the gods came to destroy them, but she decided to fight with her sisters in protecting them instead of watching them disappear. It's said that after she split from the three of her sisters who defected, Zele continued trying to persuade them not to fight until the very end.
dictionary.fusion:
I know the importance of power.
Without strength you cannot
convey your will to others.
dictionary.summon:
I hate the humans who brought
harm to my sisters and I.
You, however, are an exception.

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성과 광속성 유닛의 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌광의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌광속성 9연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 제7신식 「덴신」

dictionary.description: The third youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. During the second half of the war between the gods and the humans she fought against the Fresh Blood Sisters. As former coordinator of their group she tried convincing them to stop fighting. However, as Paula's cruel acts toward humans grew in intensity, she had no choice but to use force to end her appalling behavior. She grew powerful with determination, unleashing an unforgiving torrent of lightning on her sister.
dictionary.evolution:
I didn't have enough power before.
I wonder if now I might have
what it takes to stop her.
dictionary.fusion:
My older sister used to tell
me that I think too much.
Do you know what she meant?
dictionary.summon:
I will always love my sisters.
You knew this when you summoned
me, didn't you Summoner?

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성과 광속성 유닛의 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 뇌광신의 힘

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌광속성 15연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 제12신식 「센고」

dictionary.description: The third youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. Zele's heart was moved as she heard how much her younger sister Paula wanted to save the weak. However, Paula was resolved to use violence in order to achieve such a task, and thus Zele sought to stop her. She unleashed a rain of lighting and thunder to fry the fiendish plants surrounding her, but her younger sister's power only grew stronger. Fearing the battle would run for far too long at this rate, Zele summoned thunder clouds from all round the world, compressing their electricity within her body until she glowed in a bluish hue.
dictionary.evolution:
Subduing power with greater power.
The truth is that this approach
never reaches a conclusion...
dictionary.fusion:
You always live up to my expectations.
Heh, thanks.
dictionary.summon:
Will you show me proof that
humans have grown?
Will it convince my sisters?

leader skill.desc: 뇌속성과 광속성 유닛 공격력 65% 상승&1턴마다 HP 회복
leader skill.name: 창세뇌광신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌광속성 18연속 데미지＆3턴간 아군 전체의 공격에 화뇌광속성 부여＆스파크 시 데미지 상승
sbb.name: 신전식 「천붕」

bb.desc: 아군의 BB게이지 조금 상승&3턴간 공격에 뇌속성 부여
bb.name: 드래곤 임펄스

dictionary.description: Lizeria, capital of the La Veda Republic, was reportedly once home to a mysterious knight. Also known as the "Drakeborn," Lodin wielded his blade with reckless abandon in the law-abiding La Veda. As his second name suggested, he loved battling dragons as he longed to fight the strongest enemies he could find. Though he hated fighting cooperatively, he one day came face to face with a powerful foe that he simply couldn't beat on his own.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmph, borrowing power just
like a puny Summoner...
I've still a long way to go.
dictionary.summon:
Hey Summoner.
If you want me to follow you,
bring me someone to fight!

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛이 5속성 이상일 때 공격력 25% 상승
leader skill.name: 오광의 힘

bb.desc: 아군의 BB게이지 상승＆3턴간 공격에 뇌속성 부여
bb.name: 드레곤 디스차지

dictionary.description: A mysterious knight from the La Veda Republic. He found himself face to face with Melchio, a powerful enemy out to enslave humanity. Met with the seemingly indomitable force that he longed to clash with, he evolved into a new state of mind. Having challenged himself and lost so many times as a lone knight, he decided to throw his old ways away and rally the support of his friends in order to defeat this enemy. It is said that those who gathered to fight alongside him received the power of the lightning that surged from his sword.
dictionary.evolution:
Defeat makes you stronger.
However, I would like to survive
without having to experience it.
dictionary.fusion:
So this is what it's like to
accompany a Summoner, eh?
Not a bad combo, I must say.
dictionary.summon:
Shall I show you the
hidden side of power?
I wonder how you will change?

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛이 5속성 이상일 때 공격력 50% 상승
leader skill.name: 오광신의 힘

bb.desc: 아군의 BB게이지 상승＆3턴간 공격에 뇌속성 부여
bb.name: 라이징 퀘이사

dictionary.description: A mysterious knight from the La Veda Republic who loved two things: freedom, and fighting the strongest opponents he could find. In his second battle with Melchio, he and his comrades gained the upper hand, until a light from above revived their enemy and turned the tables on them. All were frozen except for Michele, who said the look of desperation on his face was the ugliest thing she had ever seen before rushing at their foe all by herself. Some say those words and actions gave him the impetus to stand up and fight again.
dictionary.evolution:
Friends aren't just convenient tools.
I know that now.
I've... evolved.
dictionary.fusion:
I can honestly thank you now.
This power you've lent me...
I will use it to meet your goal!
dictionary.summon:
You remind me of someone.
She loved to protect her allies,
despite being such a clumsy fool.

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛이 5속성 이상일 때 공격력 50% 상승＆BB 증가량 상승
leader skill.name: 오광전신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 14연속 데미지＆3턴간 BB게이지 서서히 증가＆3턴간 공격에 뇌속성 부여
sbb.name: 뇌신찰파충

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 3연속 데미지＆확률로 마비 효과
bb.name: 석화 부리

dictionary.description: A highly poisonous and frightening beast. According to some reports, this beast was born from the rotten egg of a rooster which was incubated by reptiles. Though full of contradictions, this process is believed to have been used in order to produce this demons for dark magic purposes. The poisonous miasma that the Cockatrice releases can defeat enemies at great distances, and the springs it has touched with its beak can never be drank from again. There are also legends which state that its strong poison can be used as materials to make miraculous medicine.
dictionary.fusion: Cluck, cluck... B'gawk!
dictionary.summon:
Cock-a-doodle-doo!
B'gawk!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 적 1명에게 뇌속성 4연속 데미지&확률로 마비효과
bb.name: 스톤 아이

dictionary.description: A highly poisonous and frightening beast. The giant eye it has on its face makes its head heavy, making it always seem like it is bowing its head as it walks around. The vision of this eye is apparently quite poor, leaving it unable to spot any enemies until they are in its near proximity. However, the threat this demon poses is in the extremely strong poison it carries in its body, which is released through its eye. As to whether the poison is released in a liquid, solid, or gas form, that still remains unclear. It is said that countless people have lost their lives trying to research this toxin.
dictionary.evolution:
Cluck! Cluck!
I am...Catoble...pas...
Cluck!
dictionary.fusion:
Be...come...stro...ng...
Cluck, cluck!
Stron...ger... Cluck!
dictionary.summon:
Su...Summon...er
Cluck, cluck!
I...I'll...go...with...you...

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 뇌속성 8연속 데미지&3턴간 BC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 세라픽 노토스

dictionary.description: The angel who judged those who defied the gods. Kushra's powers far surpassed everyone else's, and it's unknown exactly how many magical beings she sealed away. The beautiful way she danced in the sky coupled with her thunderous twin blade attack was a nightmare come true for any who betrayed the gods. But as faithful to the gods as she was, upon meeting a raging beast that'd been sealed away, she did something bizarre. She was captivated by the Fiery Beast, the power of which no one could ever truly restrain.
dictionary.fusion:
What's this powerful emotion
boiling up inside of me?
I feel like I want to just fly away.
dictionary.summon:
You're my new Master.
Command me, Kushra.
Let me slay all sinners!

leader skill.desc: 모든 상태이상에 대폭  저항
leader skill.name: 청정의 광풍

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 10연속 데미지&3턴간 BC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 로스트 클라우디

dictionary.description: The angel who once judged those who defied the gods. She questioned the Fiery Beast as it struggled having had its power sealed away. How the beast answered isn't precisely known, but on that day the angel decided to rebel. Having released the disastrous beast it's said that the angel was then confronted by a white beast that she then defeated, though from that point forward there is no record of the angel who was now free.
dictionary.evolution:
I know now I am free.
I decide myself where I land.
I am here because it is my will.
dictionary.fusion:
Those with power are free.
Hehe, nothing feels better than
to fly through the sky at will.
dictionary.summon:
You can't control me.
I choose to lend you my power.
However, that is all I will do.

leader skill.desc: 모든 상태이상 무효화
leader skill.name: 창궁의 신풍

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 12연속 데미지＆3턴간 BC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 로스트 비전

dictionary.description: Seeking her own freedom, this angel rebelled against the gods. There is no recorded trace of her after her battle with the Keeper of Order. However, there is a legend which likely points to her that speaks of an angel who came from the heavens and destroyed the gods. There are similarities between the angel and the girl from the legend said to have appeared with a flash of lightning, mowing down the gods with her twin blades. It has also been said that she fought alongside a half blood girl and a disastrous beast, though no further details of this exist.
dictionary.evolution:
There is nothing more satisfying
than releasing your true potential!
Hehe, don't you agree?
dictionary.fusion:
Power is neither good nor bad.
It is the loser who is seen as bad.
That's why I want more power!
dictionary.summon:
I've no power to lend to weaklings.
If you want my help then you must
show the power you already have!

leader skill.desc: 모든 상태이상 무효화&HP 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 영원의 신령

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 14연속 데미지＆3턴간 BC와 HC 출현율 상승
sbb.name: 파괴의 천사

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 16연속 데미지＆3턴간 BC와 HC 출현율 상승
bb.name: 로스트 비스 플라스마

dictionary.description: Seeking her own freedom, this angel rebelled against the gods. The last actions of the disastrous beast that had been despised for so long awoke the power laying dormant within Griel. When the gods attacked her, the beast took the fatal blow in her stead, stating that "our will shall always remain free, as no one can take it from us" while it perished with a smile on its face. Having learned the real meaning of freedom, she faced the gods with nothing left to fear, though she knew that this would eventually spell the end of her own life.
dictionary.evolution:
Learning the true meaning of freedom
has allowed me to fly again!
Now I am freer than ever before!
dictionary.fusion:
Nothing keeps me from seeking power.
I welcome it all gladly
in order to fulfill my purpose!
dictionary.summon:
In order to enjoy pure freedom
I must become even more powerful.
This world is too simple. He he.

leader skill.desc: 모든 상태이상 무효화&HP 30% 상승&BC와 HC 출현율 상승
leader skill.name: 영원한 천신의 생명

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 뇌속성 18연속 데미지＆확률로 1턴간 공격력 대폭 저하＆3턴간 BC와 HC 출현율 상승
sbb.name: 천사신의 뇌홍

ubb.desc: 적 전체에게 아주 강력한 뇌속성 23연속 데미지＆확률로 1턴간 공격력과 방어력 초대폭 저하＆3턴간 BB게이지 서서히 증가
ubb.name: 플로라이즈 빅토르

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복&3턴간 크리티컬 확률 조금 상승
bb.name: 큐어 클라우드

dictionary.description: A wizard who long ago led an army of mages in the Atharva Republic. Inventing a way to use lightning to create recovery magic, it's said that he was even more powerful than his fellow countryman Weiss. However, obsessed only with gaining knowledge he inadvertently caused an accident that greatly damaged his home country. As a result he was banished from his country, but as fate would have it as he was wandering the land he came across a mechanical being from another world.
dictionary.fusion:
Another of your skills, eh?
I might like to try this so-called
experience granting material.
dictionary.summon:
How interesting of you
to summon me.
Now let me examine you!

leader skill.desc: 턴 종료 후 대폭  BB게이지 증가
leader skill.name: 힘의 고동

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복＆3턴간 크리티컬 확률 상승
bb.name: 스타라이트 클라우디아

dictionary.description: A wizard who long ago led an army of mages in the Atharva Republic. The preeminent thunder magician succeeded in restoring mobility to the mechanical being he had met from another world. He ignored her stories about her master, deciding on his own to have her accompany him so that he could gain knowledge of the other world. Along the way he developed new magical architecture theories while helping with her repairs, though details of his findings weren't left behind.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm reluctant to evolve at such
an early stage in my research.
Still, I am grateful to you.
dictionary.fusion:
I like this feeling of power
but I don't know why!
It's making me angry!
dictionary.summon:
You're truly fascinating.
I won't let you escape until I've
finished researching you.

leader skill.desc: 턴 종료 후 BB게이지 크게 증가
leader skill.name: 신격의 고동

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복＆3턴간 크리티컬 확률 상승
bb.name: 스타라이트 룬

dictionary.description: A wizard who long ago led an army of mages in the Atharva Republic. After their defeat at the hands of Vishra, the cyborg subject of his research vanished. However, the otherworldly technology he had acquired from his travels with her allowed him to build a mechanical beast powered by lightning. The day after its completion, orders to return to the Atharvaian army arrived, for the war with the gods was under way. He ignored these orders, instead pursuing rumors of the whereabouts of his research subject.
dictionary.evolution:
I want to build one too.
An automaton with a soul.
Like her...
dictionary.fusion:
You're far too reliant on summoning.
Do you even understand
this art?
dictionary.summon:
Summoning me means that
you've agreed to become
my lab rat!

leader skill.desc: 턴 종료 후 BB게이지 크게 증가＆스파크 시 배틀크리스탈 출현율 상승
leader skill.name: 어둠의 고동

sbb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복＆3턴간 크리티컬 확률 상승＆전투불능 데미지를 1번 버티는 효과를 자신에게 부여
sbb.name: 라이프 스트림

bb.desc: 아군 전체의 HP 대폭 회복＆3턴간 아군 전체의 공격<comma> 방어<comma> 회복력 상승
bb.name: 라이징 포스

dictionary.description: A Summoner who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. By the time the invasion of the gods had commenced, her name and abilities as a Summoner were already well known, and she received invitations from all countries asking her to join their armies. However, it is said that she turned down all of the invitations in order to protect the hometown where she was born. Shortly, she began to hear the voices of the gods in her dreams, which revealed to her a way to help the humans escape from the invasion. The next day she immediately decided to contact her childhood friend fighting far away.
